item.description:
Please join me on the Charles in Cambridge for a slow-paced, 4 mile run.

We will start at the Boston side of the Harvard Bridge, at the bottom of the walking ramp. We'll then head west and cross at River Street to get back to the starting point.

For this run I may do a 5 minute run and 1 minute walk, or I may just run straight through at about an 11 minute mile pace. We can discuss what everyone is comfortable with before we get going.

Faster runners are welcome to join us!!!

You can check out a map of the route here: http://www.mapmyfitne...

Let me know if you have any questions or concerns. I'll send my cell number out on Tuesday to make sure you can find me.

Andy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a black and yellow running hat.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Early Morning Charles River Run for Slower Runners
